intro.content: This cookie policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, what types of cookies we employ, and how you can manage your preferences.

whatAre.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAre.description: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us improve your experience and provide essential functionalities.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: Essential for the operation of the site. Cannot be disabled.
necessary.cart: Keeps products in your shopping cart

analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our site using Google Analytics 4.
analytics.ga: Main Google Analytics cookie to distinguish users
analytics.gid: Registers a unique ID to generate statistical data

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: Allow remembering information that changes the way the site behaves or looks, such as your preferred language.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: We currently do not use marketing cookies, but this may change in the future. We will always request your explicit consent.

session.title: Session cookies
session.description: Deleted when you close your browser

persistent.title: Persistent cookies
persistent.description: Remain on your device until they expire or you delete them

googleAnalytics.title: Google Analytics and Consent Mode v2
googleAnalytics.description: We use Google Analytics 4 with Consent Mode v2, which respects your privacy preferences. We collect information about:

consent.description: We implement a consent system that complies with GDPR and ePrivacy:
consent.defaultDenied: By default, all optional cookies are disabled
consent.explicit: We request your explicit consent for analytics and marketing cookies
consent.granular: You can choose which types of cookies to accept
consent.persistent: Your preferences are saved and respected in future visits
